# diagnosisKeysAvailableHandler

**Instance Property**

The handler that receives available diagnosis keys after a successful preauthorization.

## Declaration

```swift
var diagnosisKeysAvailableHandler: ENDiagnosisKeysAvailableHandler? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property before calling  [doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENManager/requestPreAuthorizedDiagnosisKeys(completionHandler:)] to ensure [doc://com.apple.exposurenotification/documentation/ExposureNotification/ENManager] can deliver the keys. Authorization expires after five days or the first time this method is called after authorization, whichever comes first.

## Preauthorizing Exposure Keys

- **requestPreAuthorizedDiagnosisKeys(completionHandler:)**: Requests diagnosis keys after the user authorizes sharing them.
- **preAuthorizeDiagnosisKeys(completionHandler:)**: Allows users to authorize a one-time release of diagnosis keys within five days of the authorization.
- **ENDiagnosisKeysAvailableHandler**: The handler the system invokes after requesting diagnosis keys.
